pkgmetadata.longdescription: Entity Resolution with Random Partition Priors for Microclustering // An implementation of the model in Betancourt, Zanella, Steorts (2020) arXiv:2004.02008, which performs microclustering models for categorical data. The package provides a vignette for two proposed methods in the paper as well as two standard Bayesian non-parametric clustering approaches for entity resolution. The experiments are reproducible and illustrated using a simple vignette. LICENSE: GPL-3 + file license.
